src:
LAGANIZZA PONEDELJAK TIKET 05: Udarno uz 3+ na utakmici SPAL-a i Sampdorije
Čist ćar na kvoti 20, umesto na standardnih 16,41

04 Nov 2019

Šapnite vešem operateru:“Otkkucajte mi LAGANIZZA PONEDELJAK 05“. Odgovor s one strane pulta donosi vam kvotu 20,0, umesto standarnih 16,41. Ako vam je lakše do 20.30 časova ovaj listić možete pokupiti i preko mozzartbet.com aplikacije, a savet je da požurite, pa da mirno uživate u fudbalu, nadamo se i dobitku nakon što VBA dobije Stouk na utakmici koja počinje u 21.00 časova.


20.30: (2,65) BOHUM (3,25) NIRNBERG (2,70)



20.45: (2,55) SPAL (3,15) SAMPDORIJA (2,85)



20.45: (3,50) AVR (3,10) NANSI (3,00)



21.00: (3,05) STOUK (3,25) VBA (2,70)


Konkretno za prolazak LAGANIZZA PONEDELJKA 05 uz već navedeno traži se da Bohum i Nirnberg u grpotlu Cvajte odigraju GG3+, da SPAL i Sampdorija izađu na makar 3+, te da AVR i Nansi sa makar dva gola pojačaju duplu šansu 1X. Mislite da je reč o kladilačkom hiperrealizmu? Smatrate li da lagano sve može da dođe? Ako je tako, onda se dalje ne zadržavajte na redovima ove rubrike. DONESITE ODLUKU i odigrajte LAGANIZZA PONEDELJAK 05 za svoj igrački merak.


* Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
LAGANIZZA MONDAY TICKET 05: Hit 3+ on SPAL and Sampdoria match
Pure fervor at odds of 20, instead of the standard 16.41

04 Nov 2019

Whisper to your operator: "Type me LAGANIZZA MONDAY 05". The answer from the other side of the counter gives you a quota of 20.0, instead of the standard 16.41. If you find it easier by 8:30 pm, you can also pick up this slip through the mozzartbet.com application, and the advice is to hurry up and enjoy football peacefully, and hopefully a win after the VBA gets Stoke at a game that starts at 9pm.


8.30pm: (2.65) BOHUM (3.25) NIRNBERG (2.70)



8.45pm: (2.55) SPAL (3.15) SAMPDORIA (2.85)



20.45: (3,50) AVR (3,10) NANSI (3,00)



9pm: (3.05) STOUK (3.25) VBA (2.70)


Specifically for the passage of LAGANIZZA MONDAY 05 with the above, it is required that Bohum and Nuremberg play GG3 + in Grpotle Cvajte, SPAL and Sampdoria come out at least 3+, and AVR and Nansi with at least two goals increase double chance 1X. Do you think it's betting on hyperrealism? Do you think that anything can come easily? If so, then stay away from this section. BECOME A DECISION AND PLAY LAGANIZZA MONDAY 05 for your toy bullet.


* Odds are subject to change
